input.sentences: the officer arrives on the scene of a car accident .
the police officer approaches the damaged vehicle .
it looks as though the car had been rear ended as the majority of damage is located at the rear driver 's side tail light .
there is more damage near the driver 's side panel .
the passenger in the damaged vehicle exits the car .
output.sentences: At the crash scene, the officer pulls over in his car.
The wrecked vehicle is being observed by the police officer.
The tail end of the rear has majority of the left side totaled.
The panel on the driver side is damaged heavily.
The vehicle door opens and passenger exits, seemingly unscathed.
